name: Account Processor
description: Recompute custom properties and emit events with Javascript logic whenever an account is updated

private_settings.name: sentry_dsn
private_settings.title: Sentry DSN
private_settings.description: URL of a sentry instance to collect logs and exception notifications

private_settings.name: variables
private_settings.title: Custom Variables
private_settings.description: Define custom variables here. usually things you don't want to save in the Connector's code, such as API Keys, or values you want to allow non-technical users to be able to update. A variable you define as `foo` Will be available as `variables.foo` in the code editor. Only Strings are supported here

private_settings.name: synchronized_account_segments
private_settings.title: Account Filter
private_settings.description: Which Accounts are sent through the processor

private_settings.name: language
private_settings.title: Processing language
private_settings.description: Choose which processing language to use. We support Javascript, and JSONata, which is an easy to use declarative mapping language

private_settings.name: code
private_settings.title: Code
private_settings.description: Enter Javascript code here, It will receive the data in the middle column, can emit `traits()`. Preview results on the right. Save when finished

settings_sections.title: Configuration
settings_sections.description: Configure the way the processor runs
